---
title: 正态分布
output: html_document
---

```{r echo=F}
library('ggplot2');
```

```{r}
x <- seq(-10, 10, by = 0.1);

ggplot(data.frame(x = x, y = dnorm(x, 0, 2)), aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal();

ggplot(data.frame(x = x, y = pnorm(x, 0, 2)), aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal();
```
